IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package visualisation :: Module rendering :: Class ContactProbabilityRenderer

Class ContactProbabilityRenderer

source code

Renders the contact probabilities of body model points.

Intended to visualise results of the ContactTrackingKalmanFilter.

Additional arguments are passed to the mayavi.mlab.points3d function to control the appearance of the rendered model.
